name: Penguin saves the world and leaves for Brazil
name_original: Penguin saves the world and leaves for Brazil
description:
Prologue:

You live quietly in your cool car, and then, suddenly, there are some freaks appeares who want to kill everyone

You will show them, that's beeing bad is bad

Control buttons:

Press move keys to move if you want

Don't press anything if you don't want to

I respect your choice
